excerpt: “Dirty” Harry Callahan suspects a squad of sharp-shooting young motorcycle officers are operating as vigilantes, executing criminals the courts won’t touch.
title: Magnum Force

excerpt: When a small-town diner owner makes national news by stopping two spree killers, an east coast mobster shows up claiming the hero is actually a notorious Philadelphia killer.
title: A History of Violence

excerpt: After losing his arm when his school is massacred, kung-fu student Jimmy Wang Yu transforms his remaining arm into an indestructible instrument of vengeance.
title: One-Armed Boxer

excerpt: A Northern California fishing village comes under assault from sea monsters bent on breeding with human women.
title: Humanoids from the Deep

excerpt: An alluring Hong Kong woman hires Ti Lung and his team of matching-tracksuit-wearing commandos to hunt down her father’s killer in Cambodia.
title: Mercenaries from Hong Kong
